content: sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 99 sts 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif row 8 c3- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch row 2 ws k3 p to last 3 sts k2 sl1wyif sl1wyif >cut c3 garter stripes tip - weave in ends as you go row 9 c1- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 103 sts row 1 c1- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 87 sts row 10 c1- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch sl1wyif monsterknits good karma 3 0 12/23 p age | 3 row 11 c1- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last round 3 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 107 sts 158 166 174 182 190 sts row 12 c1- k to center stitch p1 k to last stitch round 4 c1- k to end sl1wyif >join c3 stockinette using c1 work row 1-2 nine times round 5 c3- sl1wyib k1 to m m1l sl1wyib m1r +36 sts 143 sts k1 sl1wyib to last st k1 160 168 176 184 192 row 1 c1- k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts sts m1l k2 sl1wyif round 6 c3- sl1wyib p1 to 1 sts before m p1 row 2 c1- k3 p to last 3 sts k2 sl1wyif sl1wyib p1 p1 sl1wyib to last st p1 round 7 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 162 170 178 186 194 sts garter - using c1 round 8 c1- k to end row 1 k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts m1l k to last 3 sts m1l k2 sl1wyif 147 sts >cut c2 & c3 row 2 k to m p1 k to last stitch sl1wyif garter - using c1 work rounds 1-2 twice joining in the round - using c1 round 1 c1- p to m m1l k1 m1r p to end 198 200 sts when carrying unused color up inside of work in slip_stitch sections twist unused yarn with working round 2 c1- k to end yarn at the beginning of every round by bringing carried yarn from right to left over working yarn continue with working yarn stockinette - using c1 work rounds 1-2 five times round 1 rs k3 m1r k to m m1l k1 m1r k to last 3 sts m1l k3 151 sts round 1 c1- k to m m1l k1 m1r k to end 202 204 206 208 210 sts join in the round place beginning of round marker this marker is the new end of round 151 round 2 c1- k to end sts increases will now only be at the center of cowl garter stripes - work rounds 1-12 once then round 2 rs p to m k1 p to end work rounds
